title: Rare 80s EPs Vol. 3 - Bone Symphony - Bone Symphony EP [1984]
description:
I have a number of great 80s EPs that users request from me from time to time. I had never posted them before as you are aware an extended play (EP) is a vinyl record or CD which contains more music than a single, but is too short to qualify as an LP. Usually, an EP has around 10ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“28 minutes of music, for this reason they never made it to 4 rare 80s albums series. Vol. 3 is my pick too and a great new wave record.
